name: goingUP - Web Test Build
description:
This is a development test build for my Android game goingUP. This only exists to make it as easy as possible to test my game. If you do have an Android device, it is suggested that you play this game on it for the intended experience.

NOTE:

Since this game is intended for Android, there's some things here and there that will look or act strange. I won't be actively fixing these things in this build since I already have limited time to work on this game and having to support another platform is a huge amount of work on top of what I already have.
